name: Alien Scumbags
description:
Roam the dark of the Nostrami shuttle and kick ass!

The ship Nostrami has been incommunicado for 48 hours now. We need you Master Chef with your abnormally sized head to investigate. Explore the dark corridors of Nostrami and remember kill first, ask questions later!

Features

  • A unique mix of horror and tongue in cheek humour
  • 11 fully interactive environments
  • Unique 8 bit style graphics with modern effects
  • Original dark ambient soundtrack
  • Hide in lockers to dodge the horrors on the Nostrami
  • Find out what happened to the crew by collecting data
    disk's

Update log
    V7.9
  • Further amendments to inventory
  • Improvements for L5
  • New level added
  • Upwards firing
  • Improved face hugger movements
  • New voicework added
  • Added new ceiling enemies to make upward firing more
    useful
  • Some object GFX improvements
  • Use button added for switches/interactivity
  • More interactivity with objects
  • All brightness settings are now a bit brighter
  • Aliens can now run from bombs
